content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The ACCU-Beam ® Universal Micromanipulator connects articulated arm CO₂ lasers to surgical microscopes and colposcopes. A variety of mounts are available for compatibility with connecting equipment, and it can be configured for ENT or gynecology.

  • Zoom assembly for variable spot size
  • 200-400mm working distance
  • Adjustable joystick tension
  • Configurations for ENT or gynecology
  • Microscope/Colposcope adapters for compatibility
  • Laser thread adapters for compatibility

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72323,73232″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1580835366725{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Universal Micromanipulator

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our Universal Micromanipulator allows you to connect almost any CO₂ laser to almost any colposcope or microscope. It’s patented design allows for high quality results while remaining much more cost-effective than our competition. Our extensive catalog of microscope/colposcope mounts and laser thread adapters ensures the widest range of compatibility.

Available in configurations for ENT or gynecology, the Universal Micromanipulator features a zoom assembly for adjustable beam focus and spot size, adjustable joystick tension, a removable hand-rest, and 360 degree rotation for mounting. The spot size generated by the manipulator depends on the input beam diameter and the working distance.

Part # 7004

U.S. Patent No.  5,291,336[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d540117-6402″][vc_column_text]Compatible with Zeiss, Leica, Moller-Wedel, Storz/Global, JedMed/Kaps, Olympus, Leisegang, Ecleris, YDJ, Atmos, Topcon, Wallach and many other colposcopes/microscopes.

Compatible with Sharplan, NIIC, LaserSonics, Merrimack, Illumina, Coherent, Intermedic, Lumenis, Zeiss, SWOT, Ellman/Sandstone, Union, Lasering, DEKA, Syneron, Bison, JH Laser and many other lasers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d0117-6402″][vc_column_text]The Universal Micromanipulator is a class 2 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a0117-6402″][vc_column_text] All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
